snippet: Dr. Mohamed Tennari from the Syrian town of Sarmeen played a video that he said showed victims of an attack last month being treated.
abstract: United Nations Security Council views video evidence of chemical attack in Syria; American ambassador Samantha Power says Council is determined to find who is responsible and hold them accountable.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Mohamed Tennari from the Syrian town of Sarmeen played a video that he said showed victims of an attack last month being treated.

headline.main: U.N. Security Council Sees Video Evidence of a Chemical Attack in Syria
headline.print_headline: U.N. Security Council Sees Video Evidence of a Chemical Attack in Syria

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
